REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0594 reute r f BC-INTEGRATED-RESOURCES 04-27 0072

TEXT.TITLE: INTEGRATED RESOURCES SETS UP BRANCHES IN HONG KONG
TEXT.BODY: U.S.-based insurance and investment broker <Integrated Resources Inc> has set up two subsidiaries in Hong Kong, a company statement said. <Integrated Resources Insurance and Investment Services Ltd> will focus on insurance marketing and <Integrated Resources (HK) Ltd> on stock broking. The statement gave no financial details for the local firms. REUTER
